attributes.action: not restrict the amount of flights people can make each year, to two flights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I read last night that Mr Brown is thinking of restricting the amount of flights we can do each year, to two flights. Will Mr Brown only be making two flights a year also??

rejection.details: We are unaware of any such proposal.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
